question: What is AMPHEX – 21, that was seen in the news recently?
option3: Tri service joint exercise of India
answer: Tri service joint exercise of India
explanation:
AMPEX 21 is India’s tri-service joint amphibious exercise which was conducted in the Andaman & Nicobar group of islands. It involved the participation of Naval vessels, Army’s amphibious troops and flying machines of the Air force.
The aim of conducting this exercise is to validate the security force’s capabilities to safeguard the territorial integrity and enhance interoperability among the three forces.
